transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Hello?
Hello? Haan yes sir.
Han sir business kar rahe hain.
Ji actually main aapki aawaz clear nahi aa rahi aap kya bol rahe ho?
Customer: Meri mera IndiaMART pe profile hai JS Business India naam se.
Executive: Yes yes yes.
Customer: Ji ji ji. Haan sir hai bilkul hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: To maine na abhi recently ek do din pehle kuch photo cheeze matlab update kari hai isme apne profile pe website pages mein kuch photos vagera upload kari hai to ye live hone mein sir kitna samay lag jata hai?
Executive: Sir live hand to hand ho jata hai vaise.
Customer: Ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Ho jata hai.
Customer: Jaise main abhi Google pe naam dalta hu to wo purane wali purani photo hi dikhata hai to naye photo kab tak shayad samay lagega.
Executive: Ek minute ruko.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Kar leta hu aapke photo.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan haan sir.
Executive: Aapke char hi product hai sir only 450 gram organic jaggery powder aur 150 gram JS Basundi jaggery tea premix 450 gram organic jaggery cube aur 150 gram JS jaggery tea premix.
Customer: Haan haan. To ye aapki catalog waha pe dikh nahi rahi hai kya aapko isme? Nahi ye dikh raha hai ye dekho charo charo product dikh rahe hain.
Customer: Nahi product barabar hai. Ye about us mein maine company album mein kuch photo vagera change kare.
Executive: Company album mein?
Customer: Haan. Yaha par abhi dikh rahi hai photo vagera dikh rahi hai char ek aapki.
Executive: Aisa hi hai kuch aur ye kuch aur bhi hai iske alawa?
Customer: To itna hai to ye matlab ho gaya hai kya live ye?
Executive: Haan aapke char image dikh rahi hai four image.
Customer: Jaise ki ye aapko dikh rahi hai na mujhe mujhe bhi dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Pehle na jab maine haan. Ek JS Business India ka ek chai ka photo hai uska photo laga hua hai baki ek office ka photo hai ek aapke jo factory hai bahar se uska photo hai.
Executive: Barabar.
Customer: Nahi jaise abhi main Google pe search karta hu na mera naam to jo IndiaMART mein maine pehle purane photo lagaye the wohi aate hain.
Executive: Aap Google par search karo usko refresh karna na usko aap usko refresh karo ek bar search karne ke baad.
Customer: Kar raha hu main to wo purani aa rahi hai matlab naye abhi catalog upload kiya hai to usko shayad wo live hone ke hai abhi matlab Google pe.
Executive: Nahi live hand to hand ho jata hai sir.
Executive: JS Business India hai na ek minute ruko main abhi check karta hu.
Executive: Ji ji sir.
Executive: Sir char hi product dikh rahe hain bas apne wohi.
Customer: Haan wohi wohi.
Customer: Us din aap se baat hui meri aapne mujhe wo samjhaya ki haan istemal karo kiraya de diya bas lead nahi aa rahe fir tab us din se main socha karta hu karta hu tabhi uske upar main abhi shuru kar raha hu kaam karna abhi.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. To aap mera number likh lo na sir aapne to shayad customer care helpline mein call kiya hai na abhi?
Customer: Haan haan uske number pe kiya hai maine.
Executive: Aapke paas number tha maine aapko WhatsApp vagera mera number likho 8788 likho likho 8700.
Customer: 8700.
Executive: 425
Customer: 425.
Executive: 669
Customer: Ji. Haan sir aapka number hai mere paas ye.
Executive: Aapke mere number hai na aapke paas? To aapko kabhi bhi issue hota hai to IndiaMART ke regarding mera number jo hai Sudesh Yadav aap uske according waha pe aap kar sakte ho. Dusri baat sir kya hai ki aapka jo main dekh raha hu yaha par ki product char rakhe hue hain aapne.
Customer: Ji. Sahi baat nahi chalo thik hai.
Executive: Bas iske andar aapko ek cheez ka aur dhyan rakho aapko tension aa rahi hai aapne isko call kiya hai to aur kuch samjhna sir aapko iske andar? Iske alawa doubt tha.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Hmm? Actually sir ek chhoti si baat thi ki aapko jaise mere product char dikh rahe hain na to usme jaggery candy hai wo aapki aawaz kam aa rahi hai kya keh rahe ho?
Customer: Ek second ek second. Abhi aa rahi hai sir aawaz? Haan aa rahi hai aa rahi hai. Aapko char product dikh rahe honge aapko. Hmm hmm. Usme se jo jaggery cube aur jaggery powder hai wo bhi basically wo bhi mera main product nahi hai wo matlab wo wo nahi bhi becho to chalega mere product sir tea premix hai. To wo do hi product hai uske alawa ek tea premix aur baki jo product hai kisi aur kisi aur naam se bhi add karu sir usko. Jo tea premix hota hai wo loose mein bhi rakhte ho loose mein loose card cardman tea premix rakh ke usko. Sir loose mein aisa hai ki wo silver panni mein milta hai sir silver pouch mein. Main samajh gaya aapki baat to sabhi kisi na kisi ka hota hai wo 1 kg 2 kg. Nahi nahi nahi 150 gram ka packet. Packet hai thik hai. Ye yahi same cheez hoti hai. Bas wo yahi cheez hoti hai bas wo lemon tea premix bhi hai lemon tea premix? Nahi nahi nahi lemon tea vagera filhal nahi hai sir. Cardman aur masala hai. Nahi jo wo sab the na wo jo catalog banaya tha to wo madam ne zabardasti dalwa diye the ki ye dal do tabhi catalog chalu ho jaye to aise kuch bhi nahi hai ek wo jaggery tea hai aur ek regular tea hai do hi product hai sir mere abhi. Okay.
Customer: Ji. Mujhe tea premix ki hi requirements matlab chahiye mujhe wo leads iske nahi chahiye mujhe jyadatar dikhte hain sir jaggery powder aur jaggery powder ki dikhte hain kyuki maine wo product add karke rakha hai to mujhe uske nahi chahiye mujhe jyadatar premix ke hi chahiye leads. Hmm. Samajh raha hu. Wahi to aapne jo product hai na jaggery powder ye loose cardman loose cardman tea premix dal do. Wo jo Basundi tea premix aa gaya na usi ke andar sab kuch aa gaya cardman bhi usi ke andar sare masale aa gaye aise separate separate nahi banata wo. Nahi nahi nahi sir wo alag alag jitna jyada product hoga to utna jyada inquiry relevant aayega. Barabar. Loose masala loose masala dal do loose masala tea premix ye bhi add kar du? Nahi na sir wo mat kijiye. Hmm? Nahi nahi nahi wo mat kijiye. Achha aur ye loose lemon tea to bana hi kar rahe ho aap thik hai baki jo do product hai aapke jo product hai ye jaggery powder hata du usko? Haan jaggery powder aur jaggery candy hata dijiye mere ko aisa lagta hai ki unko hata denge to fir mujhe sirf premix ke aayenge. Jaggery cube? Cubes bhi hata dijiye aur wo powder bhi hata dijiye. Jaggery tea premix hai loose cardman tea premix teen product hai thik hai abhi live abhi in teen ko chalao. Sorry? Thik hai abhi in teen ko chalao. Loose cardman tea premix hai. Haan dekho loose jaggery tea premix hai aur Basundi jaggery tea premix hai thik hai. Ji ji ji. Abhi teen product hai inko chalao thik hai? Haan haan. Bas abhi kuch hai na to main close kar raha tha thik hai. Thoda sa aayega sir aapke paas thik hai sir kya bole? Main aapka concern na close kar raha hu thik hai sir 9696 pe call kiya hai mera feedback aayega ki agar aap meri baato se sunte ho to to aap agar satisfy ho to waha pe click kar sakte ho sir thik hai aapke bhi mail pe bhi okay thik hai sir.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to update photos on IndiaMART profile.

- Wants to remove jaggery powder and candy products.

- Wants leads for tea premix only.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed only 4 products are visible.

- Executive removed jaggery powder and candy products.

- Executive suggested adding loose tea premix.



Next Steps: 

- Executive closed the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, photos, tea premix, products, catalog
